events.message: The customer reported a car collision that took place yesterday evening at an intersection, which caused significant damage to the front bumper and headlights.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and photos submitted by the claimant.
An insurance agent specializing in vehicle accident claims has been assigned to handle this case and will coordinate further communication.
Acknowledgement of the claim has been sent to the customer, providing assurance that the case is now under active review.
Request sent for additional documents including the police report, repair estimates, and photos of the vehicle damage to continue processing.
Customer has submitted all requested documents, including detailed repair quotes and the official police accident report.
Investigation has begun to verify the legitimacy of the damages claimed and to assess liability based on submitted evidence.
Investigation concluded with confirmation that the damages reported are consistent with the accident circumstances outlined.
A settlement amount has been proposed based on repair costs and policy coverage, sent to the customer for approval.
The customer has reviewed and agreed with the proposed settlement, expressing satisfaction with the timely handling of the claim.
The claim has been officially approved following customer acceptance of the settlement amount and terms offered.
Payment for the agreed settlement has been issued to the customerâ€™s bank account to cover vehicle repair expenses.
The claim has been formally closed after payment issuance and confirmation of customer satisfaction with the resolution.
All claim documents and correspondence have been archived for record-keeping and future reference.
